workflow_runs.name: Functional tests
workflow_runs.display_title: Restore qtglean/Cargo.lock (#7027)

head_commit.message:
Restore qtglean/Cargo.lock (#7027)

Cargo.lock files are required so that a given version of Mozilla VPN
can be rebuilt from the same code.

The NixOS package cannot be built without Cargo.lock, because NixOS
enforces this kind of determinism using a sandbox that disables
network access for builds that don’t have a fixed output hash.

This undoes #6278.  See also #3341, #5236.

Signed-off-by: Anders Kaseorg <andersk@mit.edu>

workflow_runs.name: Functional tests
workflow_runs.display_title: Fix linux split-tunnelling (#6505)

head_commit.message:
Fix linux split-tunnelling (#6505)

* Activate daemon (and transmit fwmark value) before adding rules

* Correct priority of mangle rule

See #6394

When using Raw, the fwmark (and all following routing etc.) is only
applied to the first packet sent out.
